topics.title: What's happend on a very large websites?
topics.body:
Let's say we want to create website like Twitter. On current implementation it will be impossible due to the data quantity (We can't ask from each client to store the hole database).

Do you think how to solve it? Where is an option for sub-websites (ie. profiles) that created automatically?

1@223.body: Also there is a problem of custom searching..

Cloning it's fine until you want to publish an update.. I think it's too loose. 
How can I release a new feature to all the profiles an once?
